results.name: Trajectory of 1 under the morphism 1->{2,1}, 2->{2,3}, 3->{4,3}, 4->{4,1}.
comment: This is the reverse of the morphism in A105500 and the trajectory of 1 actually starts with 2 instead of 1.
link: F. M. Dekking, Recurrent sets, Advances in Mathematics, vol. 44, no. 1 (1982), 78-104.
Index entries for sequences that are fixed points of mappings
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 20 2005
